mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue (id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address) values (#{id},#{fullname},#{appellation},#{owner},#{company},#{job},#{email},#{phone},#{website},#{mphone},#{state},#{source},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{description},#{contactSummary},#{nextContactTime},#{address});
mapper.select:
select
c.id, c.fullname, c.appellation, u.name as owner, c.company, c.job, c.email, c.phone, c.website, c.mphone, c.state, c.source, c.createBy, c.createTime, c.editBy, c.editTime, c.description, c.contactSummary, c.nextContactTime, c.address
from tbl_clue c JOIN tbl_user u ON c.owner = u.id
c.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and c.company like '%' #{company} '%'
and c.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
and c.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and c.mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
and c.state like '%' #{state} '%'
order by c.createTime desc

select count(*) from tbl_clue c JOIN tbl_user u ON c.owner = u.id
c.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and c.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
c.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
and c.source like '%' #{source} '%'
u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and c.mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
c.state like '%' #{state} '%'

select c.id, c.fullname, c.appellation, u.name as owner, c.company, c.job, c.email, c.phone, c.website, c.mphone, c.state, c.source, c.createBy, c.createTime, c.editBy, c.editTime, c.description, c.contactSummary, c.nextContactTime, c.address from tbl_clue c join tbl_user u on c.owner = u.id and c.id = #{id}
